channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The response on the right has been absolutely deranged’: Tim Miller reacts to Minnesota shootings

item.description: President Trump's acts of clemency often release criminals with "no further fines, restitution, probation or other conditions."

item.title: R. Kelly hospitalized after alleged overdose in prison, attorneys say
item.description: The disgraced R&B singer is currently serving a 30-year prison sentence.

item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Trump calls for Iran's 'UNCONDITIONAL SURRENDER'
item.description: Iran and Israel continued to exchange attacks into Tuesday amid the latest round of conflict between the two nations.

item.title: Sen. Mike Lee faces criticism over posts on Minnesota shooting
item.description: Republican Sen. Mike Lee is facing criticism over his social media posts about the assassination of a Minnesota lawmaker and her husband.

item.title: Baltimore Pride celebrates 50 years of supporting LGBTQ+ community
item.description: Baltimore Pride started 50 years ago with a rally near the Washington Monument in the Mount Vernon neighborhood.

item.title: NYC Comptroller and mayoral candidate Brad Lander arrested
item.description: NYC Comptroller and Democratic mayoral candidate Brad Lander was arrested by ICE agents Tuesday at immigration court in Manhattan.

item.title: Jury asks three questions during Karen Read trial deliberations
item.description: Jury deliberations are still ongoing in in the Karen Read murder trial. CBS News Boston's Penny Kmitt has more.
